descriptionHtml:
Description: This is my version of a Faendal improvement mod.  It is just a simple edit that makes Faendal look younger and changes the weird, half shaven ponytail hair to some average, slicked back, hair.  It also gives Faendal a light beard.  I know mods like these are done all the time and can get tiresome but I couldn\'t find a Faendal improvement that I liked so I made my own and decided to upload it here.

Compatability and Bugs: If you have any issues, tell me in the comment section and I will try to help you.  This is likely incompatible with any other mod that specifically edits Faendal (it is compatible with UFO).

Installation: Put the .esp and texture folder into your data folder.

Permission: Honestly, you can do whatever you want with this. If you use this, some credit would be nice but this is such a simple mod that I really don\'t expect it. If you want to give someone credit,a shout out to Bethesda in your readme or description would be nice.

Credits: Bethesda for Skyrim
Any modders who make crafting mods for all of the lovely things you do
author: RaisTheWolf
